name: Activist
description: Person who campaigns to bring about political or social change.
description_es: Persona que hace campaña para lograr cambios políticos o sociales.

name: Actor
description: Person who performs in plays, movies, television, or other media.
description_es: Persona que actúa en obras de teatro, películas, televisión u otros medios.

name: Architect
description: Professional who designs buildings and oversees their construction.
description_es: Profesional que diseña edificios y supervisa su construcción.

name: Artist
description: Person who creates art through various mediums and creative expression.
description_es: Persona que crea arte a través de diversos medios y expresión creativa.

name: Astronaut
description: Person trained to travel and work in space.
description_es: Persona entrenada para viajar y trabajar en el espacio.

name: Astronomer
description: Scientist who studies celestial objects and phenomena in the universe.
description_es: Científico que estudia objetos celestes y fenómenos del universo.

name: Athlete
description: Person proficient in sports and physical exercise.
description_es: Persona competente en deportes y ejercicio físico.

name: Author
description: Person who writes books, articles, or other written works.
description_es: Persona que escribe libros, artículos u otras obras escritas.

name: Biologist
description: Scientist who studies living organisms and their relationships.
description_es: Científico que estudia organismos vivos y sus relaciones.

name: Businessman
description: Person engaged in commercial or industrial business activities.
description_es: Persona dedicada a actividades comerciales o industriales.

name: Chemist
description: Scientist who studies the composition and properties of matter.
description_es: Científico que estudia la composición y propiedades de la materia.

name: Comedian
description: Entertainer who performs comedy to make audiences laugh.
description_es: Artista que hace comedia para hacer reír al público.

name: Composer
description: Person who creates musical compositions and arrangements.
description_es: Persona que crea composiciones y arreglos musicales.

name: Dancer
description: Performer who expresses ideas and emotions through movement.
description_es: Artista que expresa ideas y emociones a través del movimiento.

name: Designer
description: Professional who plans and creates visual or functional designs.
description_es: Profesional que planifica y crea diseños visuales o funcionales.

name: Diplomat
description: Official who represents and negotiates on behalf of a country.
description_es: Funcionario que representa y negocia en nombre de un país.

name: Director
description: Person who oversees and guides creative or organizational projects.
description_es: Persona que supervisa y guía proyectos creativos u organizacionales.

name: Economist
description: Expert who studies production, distribution, and consumption of resources.
description_es: Experto que estudia la producción, distribución y consumo de recursos.

name: Educator
description: Professional who teaches and facilitates learning.
description_es: Profesional que enseña y facilita el aprendizaje.

name: Engineer
description: Professional who applies scientific principles to design and build systems.
description_es: Profesional que aplica principios científicos para diseñar y construir sistemas.

name: Entrepreneur
description: Person who starts and manages new business ventures.
description_es: Persona que inicia y gestiona nuevos emprendimientos comerciales.

name: Explorer
description: Person who travels to discover new places and knowledge.
description_es: Persona que viaja para descubrir nuevos lugares y conocimiento.

name: Fashion Designer
description: Professional who creates clothing and accessories designs.
description_es: Profesional que crea diseños de ropa y accesorios.

name: Film Producer
description: Person who oversees and manages film production projects.
description_es: Persona que supervisa y gestiona proyectos de producción cinematográfica.

name: Historian
description: Scholar who studies and writes about past events and civilizations.
description_es: Académico que estudia y escribe sobre eventos pasados y civilizaciones.

name: Influencer
description: Person who affects opinions and behaviors through social media presence.
description_es: Persona que influye en opiniones y comportamientos a través de redes sociales.

name: Inventor
description: Person who creates new devices, processes, or methods.
description_es: Persona que crea nuevos dispositivos, procesos o métodos.

name: Journalist
description: Professional who collects, writes, and reports news and information.
description_es: Profesional que recopila, escribe y reporta noticias e información.

name: Judge
description: Official who presides over court proceedings and makes legal decisions.
description_es: Funcionario que preside procedimientos judiciales y toma decisiones legales.

name: Lawyer
description: Professional who practices law and represents clients in legal matters.
description_es: Profesional que practica el derecho y representa clientes en asuntos legales.

name: Mathematician
description: Expert who studies numbers, quantities, and abstract structures.
description_es: Experto que estudia números, cantidades y estructuras abstractas.

name: Military
description: Member of armed forces who serves in defense operations.
description_es: Miembro de las fuerzas armadas que sirve en operaciones de defensa.

name: Model
description: Person who poses for photographs, fashion shows, or artistic purposes.
description_es: Persona que posa para fotografías, desfiles de moda o propósitos artísticos.

name: Musician
description: Person who performs or creates music professionally.
description_es: Persona que interpreta o crea música profesionalmente.

name: Painter
description: Artist who creates visual art using paints on various surfaces.
description_es: Artista que crea arte visual usando pinturas sobre diversas superficies.

name: Philanthropist
description: Person who donates time, money, or resources to help others.
description_es: Persona que dona tiempo, dinero o recursos para ayudar a otros.

name: Philosopher
description: Thinker who studies fundamental questions about existence and knowledge.
description_es: Pensador que estudia preguntas fundamentales sobre existencia y conocimiento.

name: Photographer
description: Professional who captures images using cameras and photographic equipment.
description_es: Profesional que captura imágenes usando cámaras y equipo fotográfico.

name: Physician
description: Medical doctor who diagnoses and treats illnesses and injuries.
description_es: Doctor que diagnostica y trata enfermedades y lesiones.

name: Physicist
description: Scientist who studies matter, energy, and fundamental forces of nature.
description_es: Científico que estudia materia, energía y fuerzas fundamentales de la naturaleza.

name: Poet
description: Writer who composes poetry using rhythmic and metaphorical language.
description_es: Escritor que compone poesía usando lenguaje rítmico y metafórico.

name: Politician
description: Person involved in government and public policy making.
description_es: Persona involucrada en gobierno y elaboración de políticas públicas.

name: Producer
description: Professional who oversees creative and financial aspects of media projects.
description_es: Profesional que supervisa aspectos creativos y financieros de proyectos mediáticos.

name: Psychologist
description: Professional who studies human behavior and mental processes.
description_es: Profesional que estudia el comportamiento humano y procesos mentales.

name: Religious Leader
description: Person who guides and teaches followers in matters of faith.
description_es: Persona que guía y enseña a seguidores en asuntos de fe.

name: Revolutionary
description: Person who advocates or engages in political revolution.
description_es: Persona que promueve o participa en revolución política.

name: Scientist
description: Professional who conducts research to advance knowledge in various fields.
description_es: Profesional que realiza investigaciones para avanzar el conocimiento en diversos campos.

name: Screenwriter
description: Writer who creates scripts for films, television, or other media.
description_es: Escritor que crea guiones para cine, televisión u otros medios.

name: Sculptor
description: Artist who creates three-dimensional artworks from various materials.
description_es: Artista que crea obras de arte tridimensionales de diversos materiales.

name: Singer
description: Performer who produces musical sounds with their voice.
description_es: Artista que produce sonidos musicales con su voz.

name: Social Reformer
description: Person who works to improve society through systematic change.
description_es: Persona que trabaja para mejorar la sociedad mediante cambios sistemáticos.

name: Sociologist
description: Scholar who studies human society and social behavior.
description_es: Académico que estudia la sociedad humana y el comportamiento social.

name: Software Developer
description: Professional who designs, creates, and maintains computer programs.
description_es: Profesional que diseña, crea y mantiene programas informáticos.

name: Spiritual Leader
description: Person who provides guidance in spiritual and philosophical matters.
description_es: Persona que brinda orientación en asuntos espirituales y filosóficos.

name: Sportsperson
description: Individual who competes professionally in sports.
description_es: Individuo que compite profesionalmente en deportes.

name: Surgeon
description: Medical specialist who performs surgical operations.
description_es: Especialista médico que realiza operaciones quirúrgicas.

name: Teacher
description: Educator who instructs students in academic subjects.
description_es: Educador que instruye a estudiantes en materias académicas.

name: Writer
description: Person who creates written content across various genres and formats.
description_es: Persona que crea contenido escrito en diversos géneros y formatos.
